maqras.text: 17|70|Ara abasya'i amara adama-santanake maryada dana karechi [1]; sthale o sagare tadera calacalera bahana diyechi ebam taderake uttama riyaka dana karechi ara amara yaderake srsti karechi tadera anekera upara tadera sresthatba diyechi.

17|71|Smarana karuna se dinake, yakhana amara pratyeka sampradayake tadera ‘imama’saha [1] dakaba. Atahpara yadera dana hate tadera ‘amalanama deya habe, tara tadera ‘amalanama parabe ebam tadera upara samanna parimana'o yuluma kara habe na.
17|72|Ara ye byakti ekhana andha [1] se akhirate'o andha [2] ebam sabaceye besi pathabhrasta.

17|73|Ara amara apanara prati ya ohi karechi ta theke ora apanake padaskhalana ghatanora cesta praya curanta karechila, yate apani amadera upara setara biparita mithya ratate parena [1]; ara nihsandehe takhana tara apanake bandhurupe grahana karata.
17|74|Ara amara abicalita na rakhale apani abasya'i tadera dike praya kichuta jhumke paratena [1]
17|75|tahale abasya'i amara apanake ihajibane diguna o parajibane diguna sasti asbadana karatama; takhana amadera birud'dhe apanara jan'ya kono sahayyakari petena na [1].
17|76|Ara tara apanake desa theke utkhata karara curanta cesta karechila, apanake sekhana theke bahiskara karara jan'ya; tahale apanara para tara'o sekhane alpakala tike thakata [1].
17|77|Amadera rasuladera madhye apanara age yaderake pathiyechilama tadera ksetre'o chila erupa niyama ebam apani amadera ni'omera kono paribartana pabena na [1].
17|78|Surya hele parara para theke ratera ghana andhakara paryanta salata kayema karuna [1] ebam phajarera salata [2]. Niscaya phajarera salata upasthitira samaya [3].
17|79|Ara ratera kichu anse tahajjuda [1] adaya karuna, eta apanara jan'ya atirikta [2]. Asa kara yaya apanara raba apanake pratisthita karabena prasansita sthane [3].
17|80|Ara baluna, ‘he amara raba! Amake prabesa karara satyatara sathe ebam amake bera karana satyatara sathe [1] ebam apanara kacha theke amake dana karuna sahayyakari sakti.’
17|81|Ara baluna, ‘haka eseche o batila bilupta hayeche; ‘niscaya batila bilupta ha'oyara'i chila [1].
17|82|Ara amara nayila kari kura'ana, ya muminadera jan'ya arogya o rahamata [1], kintu ta yalimadera ksati'i brd'dhi kare [2].
17|83|Ara amara yakhana manusera prati anugraha kari takhana se mukha phiriye neya o dure sare yaya. Ara yakhana take anista sparsa kare takhana se ekebare hatasa haye pare.
17|84|Baluna, ‘pratyeke'i nija prakrti anuyayi kaja kare thake ebam apanara raba samyaka abagata achena calara pathe ke sabaceye nirbhula.‘
17|85|Ara apanake tara ruha samparke prasna kare [1]. Baluna, ‘ruha amara rabera adesaghatita [2] ebam tomaderake jnana deya hayeche ati saman'ya'i.
17|86|Ara amara icche karale apanara prati ya ohi karechi ta abasya'i pratyahara karate paratama; tarapara e bisaye apani amadera birud'dhe kono karmabidhayaka petena na [1].
17|87|Tabe eta pratyahara na kara apanara rabera daya; niscaya apanara prati ache tamra maha'anugraha [1].
17|88|Baluna, ‘yadi kura'anera anurupa kura'ana anara jan'ya manusa o jina samabeta haya ebam yadi'o tara parasparake sahayya kare tabu'o tara era anurupa anate parabe na.
17|89|‘Ara abasya'i amara manusera jan'ya e kura'ane bibhinna upama bisadabhabe barnana karechi; kintu besirabhaga manusa kuphari kara chara ksanta hayani.’
17|90|Ara tara bale, ‘amara kakhana'i tomara upara imana anaba na, yataksana na tumi amadera jan'ya bhumi hate eka prasrabana utsarita karabe
17|91|‘athaba tomara khejurera o angurera eka bagana habe yara phamke phamke tumi ajasra dharaya prabahita kare debe nadi-nala.
17|92|‘Athaba tumi yakhana bale thaka, se anuyayi akasake khanda-bikhanda kare amadera upara phelabe athaba allah o phirisataderake amadera samane upasthita karabe

17|93|‘Athaba tomara ekati sonara tairi ghara habe athaba tumi akase arohana karabe, kintu tomara akasa arohane amara kakhano imana anabo na yataksana tumi amadera prati eka kitaba nayila na karabe ya amara patha karaba [1].’ Baluna, ‘pabitra mahana amara raba! Ami to hacchi sudhu ekajana manusera rasula [2].’
17|94|Ara yakhana manusera kache hidayata ase, takhana taderake imana ana theke birata rakhe kebala tadera e katha ye, ‘allah ki manusake rasula kare pathiyechena [1]?’
17|95|Baluna, ‘phirisatagana yadi niscita haye yamine bicarana karata tabe amara asamana theke tadera kache abasya'i phirisata rasula kare pathatama.’
17|96|Baluna, ‘amara o tomadera madhye saksi hisebe allaha'i yathesta [1]; niscaya tini tamra bandadera samparke purna abahita, purnadrasta.’

17|97|Ara allah yaderake patha nirdesa karena tara to pathaprapta ebam yaderake tini pathabhrasta karena apani kakhano tadera jan'ya tamke chara an'ya ka'uke abhibhabaka pabena na. Ara kiyamatera dina amara taderake samabeta karaba tadera mukhe bhara diye cala abasthaya andha, boba o badhira kare [1]. Tadera abasasthala jahannama; yakhana'i ta stimita habe takhana'i amara tadera jan'ya agunera sikha brd'dhi kare deba [2].
17|98|Eta'i tadera pratidana, karana tara amadera nidarsana asbikara karechila o balechila, ‘asthite parinata o curna-bicurna hale'o amara ki nutana srstirupe punarut'thita haba [1]?’
